abstract: The Hunt column on search by single male professional for affordable apartment in Brooklyn; found two-bedroom unit in the newly built 10-story Atlantic Terrace co-op on South Oxford Street for $565,000.
snippet: Sarbjit Singh hoped to buy an apartment with room for visiting relatives and friends. He decided to search in Brooklyn.
lead_paragraph: Sarbjit Singh hoped to buy an apartment with room for visiting relatives and friends. He decided to search in Brooklyn.

headline.main: Room for One and Occasionally More
headline.seo: The Hunt : Brooklyn — Room for One and Occasionally More
headline.print_headline: Room for One and Occasionally More
